targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(temperature) AS "Weather API"
FROM weather_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(forecast_time) AND
  datasource = 'weatherapi'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(temperature) AS "Norwegian Meteorological Institute"
FROM weather_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(forecast_time) AND
  datasource = 'nmi'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(forecast_time,$__interval),
  avg(temperature) AS "Open Weather Map"
FROM weather_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(forecast_time) AND
  datasource = 'owm'

ORDER BY 1
